Test Name: Mycoplasma pneumoniae Macrolide (Azithromycin) Resistance Prediction, PCR
Purpose: To detect Mycoplasma pneumoniae DNA and predict macrolide (azithromycin) resistance via PCR amplification of resistance-associated gene mutations.
Container: Sterile transport tube (e.g., viral transport medium)
Equipment: Real-time PCR instrument, thermal cycler, DNA extraction kit, microcentrifuge
